mapper.update: update channel_data set product = #{product,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, role_type = #{roleType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, channel = #{channel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, popularize_date = #{popularizeDate,jdbcType=DATE}, popularize_money = #{popularizeMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, transferation = #{transferation,jdbcType=BIGINT}, modifier = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, role_type, product, channel, popularize_date, popularize_money, transferation, create_date, create_time, creator, modifier, modify_time from channel_data where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into channel_data (role_type, product, channel, popularize_date, popularize_money, transferation, create_date, create_time, creator, modifier, modify_time) values (#{roleType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{product,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{channel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{popularizeDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{popularizeMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{transferation,jdbcType=BIGINT}, current_date, now(), #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now())
mapper.select:
select id, role_type, product, channel, popularize_date, popularize_money, transferation, create_date, create_time, creator, modifier, modify_time from channel_data
#{item}

select count(1) from channel_data where 1 = 1
and creator = #{userName}
